name: demented
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unable to think or act clearly because you are extremely worried, angry, or excited by something: She was nearly demented with worry when her son didn't come home.
old-fashioned or informal crazy: The man is demented - he's going to wreck the whole operation.
